===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ちょちくぎんこう|貯蓄|tr1=chochiku|t1=savings|銀行|tr2=ginkō|t2=bank}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|ちょちく ぎんこう|acc=4|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ちょちく ぎんこう}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ちょちくぎんこう|archaic|no longer existing in Japan}} A [[savings]] [[bank]], a [[thrift]]. Established under laws passed in 1890 during the {{w|Meiji period}} and in 1920 during the {{w|Taishō period}}. Role was later [[merge]]d into that of normal banks by a law passed in 1943 during the {{w|Shōwa period}}.
